name: Level (AlexandreGuichet)
description:
Hi, 

This is my first project on Unity. 

It is a mini-game where you can move the ball with the environment. The goal is to collect tokens to unlock the next level.

Controls: 

"aswd" or "arrows" keys to move the ball. 

"Space Bar" to jump. 

Left click to attack. 

Any Feedback is appreciated. 

Thanks and Have Fun.

Mac Version : click on .app

Windows Version : There is an exec but I couldn't try the build as I work on Mac. 

GitHub : https://github.com/SaladedePoney/Level/tree/master
